landingPage.resumeText: üë®‚Äçüíª Senior Java Developer with 5+ years of experience in enterprise application development using Spring Boot, Angular, and cloud technologies. üöÄ Specialized in microservices architecture, RESTful APIs, and full-stack development with expertise in AWS, Azure, and containerization technologies. üí° Proven track record in healthcare technology solutions with strong skills in Agile methodologies and modern development practices.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.contentText: Expert in Java 11/17, Spring Boot, Spring Framework, and microservices architecture. Specialized in building scalable enterprise applications with RESTful APIs, Spring Security, and ORM frameworks like Hibernate.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.contentText: Proficient in Angular 11/18, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and Bootstrap. Creating responsive and user-friendly interfaces with modern frontend technologies and best practices.

cloud.title: Cloud Solutions
cloud.contentText: Extensive experience with AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, SQS, SNS) and Azure (AKS, Functions, Blob Storage). Expert in cloud-native architectures, containerization with Docker, and orchestration with Kubernetes.

microservices.title: Microservices Architecture
microservices.contentText: Designing and implementing scalable microservices using Spring Boot and Quarkus frameworks. Expert in distributed systems, API gateway patterns, and service mesh architectures.

devops.title: DevOps & CI/CD
devops.contentText: Proficient in Maven build automation, Jenkins CI/CD pipelines, Git version control, and deployment strategies. Experience with monitoring tools like Datadog, Splunk, and code quality tools like SonarQube.

aboutMePage.title: WHO AM I?
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: I am a Senior Java Developer with over 5 years of experience in enterprise software development, currently working at Elevance Health in Indianapolis, where I lead full-stack development initiatives for healthcare applications.
aboutMePage.paragraph_two: My expertise spans the entire software development lifecycle, from designing microservices architectures using Spring Boot and Quarkus to creating responsive frontend applications with Angular 11/18. I have extensive experience with cloud technologies, particularly AWS and Azure, where I implement scalable, cloud-native solutions using Docker and Kubernetes.
aboutMePage.paragraph_three: I'm passionate about building robust, secure, and scalable applications. My technical projects range from enterprise PDF processing systems to real-time chat applications and e-commerce platforms. I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technologies and best practices in software development.
